metadata.name: Keeper's Balls [Vineboom and Voiceline]
metadata.description:
[img=https://i.imgur.com/t3mr8c7.png][/img]
This mod simply plays a vine boom sound and the narrartor saying 'Balls' whenever Isaac encounters "Keeper's Sack".
Can be configured with [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2681875787]Mod Config Menu[/url] to adjust when the sound plays and how loud it is.
Issues? Report it [url=https://github.com/machasins/isaac_keeper_mod/issues]here[/url] or in the comments of this mod.
Thanks to [url=https://www.youtube.com/@lazymattman]Lazy Mattman[/url] for inspiration and [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2491837386]BluePipe[/url] for edited sound effects.
I used [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3034946842]Emote Binds[/url] for the creation of the demo videos.
This is truly a Mattman moment.
